name: Football Unleashed 19
description:
Score extreme TOUCHDOWNS with the ultimate 5-on-5 American Football game, Football Unleashed 19!

Whether you want to blitz your opponents with GAMECHANGERS, scout new talent with PLAYER DRAFT or hone your skills with practice sessions, you can play the perfect season with Football Unleashed 19.

GAME ON
Sharpen your gameday swagger with Training Mode, pick offense and defense plays and throw the rule book away with no flags and no fouls for the ultimate gridiron battle.

SACK THE QUARTERBACK
Draft in pro players for your legendary fantasy team.

MAKE IT RAIN DAILY
Complete Daily Missions and earn rewards to keep you coming back for more.

LINE ‘EM UP, KNOCK ‘EM DOWN
Bring the pain to your game with GAMECHANGERS and give your team the advantage, your opposition won’t know what’s hit ‘em.

LOOKIN’ FRESH
Awesome graphics and simple tap and swipe controls will drive you all the way to the bowl. Reach for the stars & stripes with our USA pigskin for ultimate arcade action.

IMPORTANT
This is a free to play game but it does includes optional in-app purchases that may be bought with real money.

Tweet #FU19!

FIND US
